name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Infinite Future
storyline: The appearance of Otto alerted the Hyperion crew to his ploy once more. What does his mask of goodwill conceal? The crew will find the answer at the former Schicksal HQ.
summary:
Version 5.2 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the beginning of the "Thus Spoke Apocalypse" arc, which includes:
• New Valkyries: Infinite Ouroboros & Midnight Absinthe
• New ELF: Klein
• New Open World: Kolosten
• New Story Chapter XXVI: The Birth of Tragedy
• New Featured Event: Valkyries' Cafeteria
• ...and more!
